snippet: Russian investigators said Friday that they would press charges against a man they accuse of arranging the killing of the journalist Anna Politkovskaya five years after her death.
lead_paragraph: Russian investigators said Friday that they would press charges against a man they accuse of arranging the killing of the journalist Anna Politkovskaya five years after her death.

headline.main: Russia: Chechen Is Accused in Journalist’s Killing
headline.print_headline: Russia: Chechen Is Accused in Journalist’s Killing
